## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (3309a46cb7d7602b6b36a782d12752e0b69f409896afc9dd2d9fa4925d65b4a6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@shadowbyte/checkout-telemetry-agent' @ 1.0.4 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
